fields.description: When enabled, a Payment Entry is automatically created upon submission of a Bank Transaction matching the configured rules.
fields.label: Enable Bank Transaction Automation

fields.description: Mode of Payment used for automatically created Payment Entries (e.g. “Wire Transfer”).
fields.label: Mode of Payment

fields.description:
When enabled, the automatically created Payment Entry is submitted immediately.
When disabled, it is saved as Draft for review.
fields.label: Automatically Submit Payment Entry

fields.description:
When enabled, the automatically created Payment Entry is reconciled with the originating Bank Transaction after submission.
This option requires “Automatically Submit Payment Entry” to be enabled.
It is recommended to enable this option only after manually processing several transactions end-to-end to verify that all related settings are correctly configured and to avoid reconciliation errors.
fields.label: Automatically Reconcile Payment Entry and Bank Transaction

fields.description: Generates a new random API Security Key and replaces the current one. If the BNM rate endpoint is already configured in Currency Exchange Settings, the "key" parameter value will be updated automatically; otherwise, you must update it manually.
fields.label: Generate New API Security Key

fields.description: Creates or updates the ERPNext "Currency Exchange Settings" to use the BNM rate endpoint from this app, including the correct API URL and required parameters.
fields.label: Configure Currency Exchange Settings

fields.description: Shared secret used to protect the BNM exchange-rate API endpoint. Provide this key as the key parameter in the Currency Exchange Settings API URL. Requests with a missing or incorrect key are rejected.
fields.label: API Security Key
